text: Sleigh Bells is an American noise pop musical group. The members are Derek E. Miller and Alexis Krauss. The group started in 2008. ==History== Miller met Krauss in 2008 when he was waiting tables at a Brazilian restaurant. On May 11, 2010, Sleigh Bells' first album Treats was released by Mom+Pop and N.E.E.T. Recordings. It got good reviews. Pitchfork gave it a score of 8.7 out of 10. On February 21, 2012 their second album Reign of Terror was released. On October 4, 2013 Sleigh Bells' third album Bitter Rivals was released. It did not get reviews as good as Treats or Reign of Terror. On the same day Sleigh Bells started a tour. ==References== Category:Musical groups established in 2008 Category:American musical groups Category:2008 establishments in the United States
title: Sleigh Bells (band)
